name: Tank Chair Hilarity
description:
Even though tank chars are not often over in flash it is really a very good offroad vehicle but you need to have extreme driving skills and meticulous preparation to ride it.Timing is all important as you methodically switch gears for optimum speeds.You don’t have to be a specific fan of Tank Chair to try it.

Features:
* Incredible 3D Graphics
* Intelligent Missions
* Addictive Experience.
* Smooth Game Play
* Real Physics
